data.title: The Heart Specialist
data.meta_description: Check out the exclusive TV Guide movie review and see our movie rating for The Heart Specialist
data.text:
2011

1 hr 40 mins

Comedy

R

Watchlist

Where to Watch

In this uproarious comedy, the chief resident (Wood Harris) at a Florida hospital does his best to keep morale high among the overworked trainees, but a dark secret from his past soon threatens to undermine his efforts and destroy his reputation.
